problems.description: Trust Hedging Portfolio, Hedge against future breakdowns.
Collaboration Reinvestment, Reinvest effort to rebuild trust.
Trust Shock Propagation, Shock propagates across roles.
Endgame Collaboration Binding, Final rules bind early handoffs.
Trust Recoverability Frontier, Compute recoverability frontier.
Governance Override for Collaboration, Override to restore collaboration.
Counterfactual Collaboration Replay, Replay collaboration with altered roles.
Trust Insurance Pool, Pool mitigates catastrophic trust loss.
Collaboration Stability Under Stress, Test collaboration under stress.
Endgame Opportunity Cost, Cost of avoided collaboration choice.
Multi-Human Coordination Game, Coordinate multiple humans with AI.
Latent Collaboration Effects, Latent issues surface late.
Shared Accountability Proof, Prove accountability formally.
Collaboration Resilience Index, Compute resilience to breakdown.
Collaboration Stress Horizon, Stress-test full horizon.
